Articles.Content:
Hi. My name, or rather my internet handle, is Dinjoralo. So far, I've managed to get three kerbanauts to the Mun, only for everything but the command pod to blow up, leaving them stranded. Then I sent a rescue vehicle, only for it to be really far away from the landing site, leading to one kerbal dying on the way and me decommissioning it. I've also got a satellite around Kerbin, which I am sure will be of no use to anyone.

I also can't figure out how to change my signature, and I seem to be locked out of changing my avatar, so if anyone could help I'd appreciate it.

Hi and Welcome! Congrats on your accomplishments! Precise landings take lots of practice. Try to use F5(quicksave) and F9 (quicksave reload) so you can try the landing again. (A good place to get practice doing precise landings is on minimus, because you can use the same ships to get there and the gravity is low so landing is easier) Also, when you get 5 posts, you can change your sig and avatar no worries. Also, that docking port in the picture is on backwards....Happy landings!

Edited August 9, 2013 by Xiphos
When the forum figures out you are not a spam bot, those features will be unlocked. Keep designing and perfecting your craft.

Try to use F5(quicksave) and F9 (quicksave reload) so you can try the landing again.

Yeah, I think I remember doing that for both the landings. I know I did it for the rescue pod, took me a lot of tries.

Also, thanks for telling me about the posting things. I've already got one of those ribbons set up.
